entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:21 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
